title: A 4-year-old news video is being shared as a recent video after the reduction in Corporate Tax
subtitle: Video showing that the USA will shift at least 200 companies from China to India due to reduction in the Corporate Tax by the Modi Government is from 2015
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared on Facebook that talks about companies shutting down their operations in China. This video is being shared in the context of Corporate Tax reduction by the Modi Government, and is being portrayed as a recent video. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post. 



Claim: The video that talks about companies shutting down operations in China is a recent one. Fact: The video in the post is an old one. It was uploaded on the ‘Arirang News’ YouTube channel in 2015. Also, the news related to 200 US companies looking to move manufacturing base from China to India was published in April-2019 and is neither related to the video in the post nor the corporate tax rate cut. So, old news stories are being shared as the outcome of Corporate Tax reduction by the Modi Government. Hence, the post is MISLEADING.

When searched on Google with the keywords ‘Companies closing factories in China’, the same video was found in the search results. But, the video was uploaded on YouTube by the ‘Arirang News’ channel in February-2015. So, the video is not related to any recent event or decision.

When searched on Google about the news on 200 US companies shifting from China to India, news articles regarding this issue can be found in the search results. According to an article published by the ‘Economic Times’ in April-2019, ‘about 200 American companies are seeking to move their manufacturing base from China to India post the general elections, a top US-based advocacy group has said, observing that there is a fantastic opportunity with firms looking at alternatives to the Communist giant.’ This news is also neither new nor related to the Modi Government’s recent decision to reduce Corporate Tax.

To sum it up, a 4-year-old news video is being shared as a recent video after the reduction in Corporate Tax.
